scripts.db:status: node -e "import('./db/mongoConnection.js').then(m => { const status = m.default.getConnectionStatus(); console.log(JSON.stringify(status, null, 2)); })"
scripts.db:connect: node -e "import('./db/mongoConnection.js').then(m => m.default.connect().then(() => console.log('✅ MongoDB connected successfully')).catch(e => console.error('❌ Error:', e.message)))"
scripts.db:info: node -e "import('./db/mongoConnection.js').then(async m => { await m.default.connect(); const info = await m.default.getDatabaseInfo(); console.log(JSON.stringify(info, null, 2)); })"
